00049 // Global variables.
00050 static u8 associationTimer;
00051 static u16 dropParent, dropChild;
00052 
00053 u8 macIsChild(u16 shortAddr);
00054 u16 addNode(u8 type, u64 *macAddr, u16 parentAddr);
00055 u16 macGetNodeAddr(u64 *macAddr);
00056 void macNotifyDrop(u16 parent, u16 child);
00057 
00078 
00079 static associatedNodes_t nodes[MAXNODES * (NODETYPE == COORD)];
00080 
00082 #define MAXCHILDREN 50
00083 
00084 typedef struct {
00085     u16 childAddr;
00086     u8  wakeup:1;
00087     u8  sleeping:1;
00088 } __attribute__((packed)) tChildTableItem;
00089 
00090 static u16 childNodeNdx;     // Used for macFirstChild() and macNextChild()
00091 
00093 static tChildTableItem childNodes[MAXCHILDREN * (NODETYPE == ROUTER)];
00094 
00107 void macAssociate(u16 shortAddr, u8 channel)
00108 {
00109     if (NODETYPE != COORD)
00110     {
00111         // This node sends a direct association packet to its new parent
00112         // The first association request is always a direct request
00113 
00114         // Create a struct pointer to the global variable...
00115         ftAssocReqDirect* direct_assoc_frame = (ftAssocReqDirect*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00116 
00117         // Set the channel.
00118         macSetOperatingChannel(channel);
00119 
00120         // Create the association command frame.
00121         direct_assoc_frame->fcf = FCF_ASSOC_REQ_DIRECT;
00122 
00123         // Increment and set the data sequence number.
00124         direct_assoc_frame->seq = macConfig.dsn++;
00125         // Complete the addressing fields.
00126         direct_assoc_frame->panid = macConfig.panId;
00127         direct_assoc_frame->destAddr= shortAddr;
00128         memcpy(&(direct_assoc_frame->srcAddr), &(macConfig.longAddr), sizeof macConfig.longAddr);
00129         direct_assoc_frame->cmd = ASSOCIATION_REQUEST;
00130         direct_assoc_frame->parentAddr = shortAddr;
00131         direct_assoc_frame->type = NODETYPE;
00132 
00133         // send data to radio.
00134         radioSendData(sizeof(ftAssocReqDirect), (u8 *)direct_assoc_frame);
00135 
00136         // Set a time out timer for an "association period" of 100 ms.
00137         associationTimer = macSetAlarm(VLP ? 100 : ASSOCIATION_TIMEOUT,
00138                                        macAssociationConfirm);
00139     }
00140 }
00141 
00147 void macAssociationConfirm(void)
00148 {
00149     if (NODETYPE != COORD) // Coords cannot associate
00150     {
00151         // We have finished the association process, kill the association timer...
00152         macTimerEnd(associationTimer);
00153 
00154         // Let app know that we got an associate packet
00155         appAssociateConfirm(!macConfig.associated);
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 // This function is only a timer callback, from a timer set in macAssociationResponse()
00160 static void sendAsResInd(void)
00161 {
00162     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00163     {
00164         // Packet has already been created, just send it.
00165         ftAssocRespIndirect *response = (ftAssocRespIndirect*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00166         radioSendData(sizeof(ftAssocRespIndirect), (u8 *)response);
00167     }
00168 }
00169 
00175 void macAssociationResponse(void)
00176 {
00177     // This code is only run by the coordinator node, as it is the only node
00178     // that originates the association response.
00179     // The coordinator must send either a direct or indirect response, depending
00180     // on which type of request it gets.
00181 
00182     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00183     {
00184         u16 shortAddress = DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR;
00185         u16 childAddr;
00186         u8 rpSent; // Was a routing packet sent?
00187 
00188         u16 fcf = mac_buffer_rx[1] + mac_buffer_rx[2]*0x100;
00189         if(fcf == FCF_ASSOC_REQ_IND) // association request indirect
00190         {
00191             ftAssocReqIndirect  *request  = (ftAssocReqIndirect *)(mac_buffer_rx+1);
00192             ftAssocRespIndirect *response = (ftAssocRespIndirect*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00193 
00194             // See if this node is already in the table
00195             DECLARE64(request->macAddr);
00196             childAddr = macGetNodeAddr(USE64(request->macAddr));
00197             if (childAddr != BROADCASTADDR && nodes[childAddr].nodeType)
00198             {
00199                 // This node already has been associated, notify its
00200                 // parent to drop them from the table
00201                 if (nodes[childAddr].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00202                     // This node was coord's child, remove it
00203                     macRemoveChild(childAddr);
00204                 else
00205                 {
00206                     // This node has already been associated, and if it was
00207                     // previously associated to another router, then have that
00208                     // router drop this node from its parent table
00209                     if (request->parentAddr != nodes[childAddr].parentShortAddress)
00210                         macNotifyDrop(nodes[childAddr].parentShortAddress, childAddr);
00211                 }
00212             }
00213 
00214             // first, send routing packet if necessary
00215             rpSent = macSendRoutingPacket(request->parentAddr);
00216 
00217             // Add the new node to the table.
00218             shortAddress = addNode(request->type, USE64(request->macAddr), request->parentAddr);
00219 
00220             response->shortAddr = shortAddress;
00221 
00222             response->fcf = FCF_ASSOC_RESP_IND;
00223             response->seq = macConfig.dsn++;
00224             response->panid   = macConfig.panId;
00225             response->dstAddr  = request->srcAddr;
00226             response->srcAddr   = macConfig.shortAddress; // If coord this is the same as macCoordShortAddress
00227             response->cmd = ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
00228             response->parentAddr = request->parentAddr;
00229             response->macAddr = request->macAddr; // long address of device that requested association
00230 
00231             // send data to radio, after a delay for routing packet to get out of the way
00232             macSetAlarm(rpSent ? MAC_RP_DELAY : 0, sendAsResInd);
00233             macConfig.busy = true;
00234 
00235             // Alert the application that we added a child
00236             appChildAssociated(shortAddress);
00237         }
00238         else if(fcf == FCF_ASSOC_REQ_DIRECT) // association response direct
00239         {
00240             volatile ftAssocReqDirect *request = (ftAssocReqDirect *)(mac_buffer_rx+1);
00241             volatile ftAssocRespDirect *response = (ftAssocRespDirect *)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00242 
00243             // See if this node is already in the table
00244             DECLARE64(request->srcAddr);
00245             childAddr = macGetNodeAddr(USE64(request->srcAddr));
00246 
00247 
00248             if (childAddr != BROADCASTADDR)
00249             {
00250                 // This node already has been associated, notify its
00251                 // parent to drop them from the table
00252                 if (nodes[childAddr].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00253                     // Remove from Coordinator table
00254                     macRemoveChild(childAddr);
00255                 else
00256                     // Notify node's parent to drop
00257                     macNotifyDrop(nodes[childAddr].parentShortAddress, childAddr);
00258             }
00259             // Add node to table, coord is parent
00260             shortAddress = addNode(request->type,
00261                                    USE64(request->srcAddr),
00262                                    DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR);
00263 
00264             response->fcf = FCF_ASSOC_RESP_DIRECT;
00265 
00266             // Increment and set the data sequence number.
00267             response->seq = macConfig.dsn++;
00268 
00269             // Complete the addressing fields.
00270             response->panid = macConfig.panId;
00271             response->dstAddr = request->srcAddr;
00272             response->srcAddr = macConfig.shortAddress; // If coord this is the same as macCoordShortAddress
00273             // Generate the payload data and record the node address data in the Pan
00274             // Coord's address table.
00275             response->cmd = ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
00276             response->shortAddr =  shortAddress;
00277 
00278             // send data to radio.
00279             radioSendData(sizeof(ftAssocRespDirect), (u8 *)response);
00280 
00281         }
00282 
00283         debugMsgStr("\r\nAssociated node ");
00284         debugMsgInt(shortAddress);
00285         debugMsgStr(" Hops = ");
00286         debugMsgInt(macGetHopCount(shortAddress));
00287         debugMsgStr("\r\n");
00288 
00289         // Let app know that a node was associated
00290         appNodeAssociated(shortAddress);
00291     }
00292 }
00293 
00306 u16 addNode(u8 type, u64 *macAddr, u16 parentAddr)
00307 {
00308     // Find the node in the table, return it or find new one
00309     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00310     {
00311         u16 i=0xffff;
00312 
00313         nodes[0].nodeType = COORD;
00314 
00315         // Check to see if the node was previously stored in the table.
00316         for (i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00317         {
00318             if(nodes[i].nodeLongAddress == *macAddr)
00319                 break;
00320         }
00321 
00322         // If node was not found, pick first empty spot
00323         if (i >= MAXNODES)
00324         {
00325             for (i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00326                 if (!nodes[i].nodeType)
00327                     break;
00328         }
00329         if (i >= MAXNODES)
00330             // Table is full, sorry
00331             return 0xffff;
00332 
00333         // Node address not found. index "i" is still set to last empty
00334         // element in the array. Index "i" becomes the node short address.
00335         nodes[i].nodeType = type;
00336         nodes[i].nodeLongAddress = *macAddr;
00337         nodes[i].parentShortAddress = parentAddr;
00338         nodes[i].lastRoutedAddress = 0;
00339         nodes[i].wakeup = 0;
00340 
00341 #if (__arm__)
00342         // Send the associated node's data to the host server
00343         u8 hostbuf[50];
00344         volatile s16 queue;
00345         if(fnGetTCP_state(host_socket) == TCP_STATE_ESTABLISHED)
00346         {
00347             // ACK handling should occur in the tcpListener function in
00348             // rumtask.c.
00349             // fnSendBufTCP returns the number of bytes buffered if successful...
00350             queue = fnSendBufTCP(host_socket, (u8 *)"WIRELESSA", 9, TCP_BUF_SEND);
00351             if(telPrintReading && (queue > 0))
00352                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nWIRELESSA buffered for TCP");
00353             else
00354                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nWIRELESSA buffer problem");
00355             memcpy(&hostbuf[16], &nodes[i], sizeof(associatedNodes_t));
00356             queue = fnSendBufTCP(host_socket, hostbuf, 30, TCP_BUF_SEND);
00357             if(telPrintReading && (queue > 0))
00358                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nAssociation buffered for TCP");
00359             else
00360                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nAssociation buffer problem");
00361         }
00362 #endif
00363 
00364         return i;
00365     }
00366     return 0;
00367 }
00368 
00383 u8 macCreateRoute(u16 shortAddr, ftRouting *frame)
00384 {
00385     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00386     {
00387         u16 node=shortAddr;
00388 
00389         if (shortAddr >= MAXNODES)
00390             return 1;
00391 
00392         // Is this a valid address?
00393         if  (!nodes[shortAddr].nodeType)
00394         {
00395             debugMsgStr("\r\nBad dest node (RP)");
00396             // Bad node, don't bother sending anything
00397             return 0;
00398         }
00399 
00400         // Is this node a direct child node?
00401         if (node == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR ||
00402             nodes[node].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00403             // There is one hop from this node to coordinator
00404             return 1;
00405 
00406         // Erase first hop (from dest end) because it should not end up in
00407         // the payload table of hops.
00408         node = nodes[node].parentShortAddress;
00409 
00410         // Count the hops to node
00411         volatile u8 hops=1;
00412         u16 *payload=NULL;
00413 
00414         if (frame)
00415             payload = &frame->shortAddr;
00416 
00417         for(;;)
00418         {
00419             if (!nodes[node].nodeType)
00420                 // bad short address, quit
00421                 return 0;
00422 
00423             // Go for another hop
00424             hops++;
00425 
00426             // see if we're just one hop away
00427             if (nodes[node].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00428             {
00429                 // Save highest parent to frame
00430                 if (frame)
00431                     frame->destAddr = node;
00432                 return hops;
00433             }
00434 
00435             // store node address in payload
00436             if (payload)
00437                 *payload++ = node;
00438 
00439             // find node's parent, the new node for next cycle
00440             node = nodes[node].parentShortAddress;
00441         }
00442     }
00443     return 0;
00444 }
00445 
00446 
00455 u16 macGetNodeAddr(u64 *macAddr)
00456 {
00457     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00458     {
00459         u16 i;
00460 
00461         for (i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00462             if (nodes[i].nodeType &&
00463                 nodes[i].nodeLongAddress == *macAddr)
00464                 return i;
00465     }
00466     // Not found, return nonsense address
00467     return BROADCASTADDR;
00468 }
00469 
00470 
00479 u8 macIsChild(u16 shortAddr)
00480 {
00481     //returns true if the node with shortAddr is a child of this node
00482 
00483     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00484     {
00485         // Check to see if the node was previously stored in the table.
00486         if (shortAddr >= MAXNODES)
00487             return 0;
00488         if(nodes[shortAddr].nodeType &&
00489            nodes[shortAddr].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00490                 return true;
00491     }
00492     else if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00493     {
00494         // This is a router node, just search child table
00495         u8 i;
00496 
00497         // Coordinator is not a child of a router ;-)
00498         if (!shortAddr)
00499             return false;
00500 
00501         // See if the node is in the table
00502         for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00503             if (childNodes[i].childAddr == shortAddr)
00504             // This node already exists, return true
00505                 return true;
00506     }
00507     return false;
00508 
00509 }
00510 
00520 u8 macIsChildSleeping(u16 shortAddr)
00521 {
00522     //returns true if the node with shortAddr is a child of this node
00523 
00524     if (NODETYPE == COORD && RUMSLEEP)
00525     {
00526         // Check to see if the node was previously stored in the table.
00527         if (shortAddr >= MAXNODES)
00528             return 0;
00529         if(nodes[shortAddr].sleeping)
00530                 return true;
00531     }
00532     else if (NODETYPE == ROUTER && RUMSLEEP)
00533     {
00534         // This is a router node, just search child table
00535         u8 i;
00536 
00537         // Coordinator is not a child of a router ;-)
00538         if (!shortAddr)
00539             return false;
00540 
00541         // See if the node is in the table
00542         for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00543             if (childNodes[i].childAddr == shortAddr &&
00544                 childNodes[i].sleeping)
00545                 return true;
00546     }
00547     return false;
00548 
00549 }
00550 
00559 void macAddChild(u16 shortAddr)
00560 {
00561     if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00562     {
00563         u8 i;
00564 
00565         // See if the node is already in the table
00566         for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00567             if (childNodes[i].childAddr == shortAddr)
00568             {
00569                 // This node already exists, just turn sleep off
00570                 childNodes[i].wakeup = false;
00571                 childNodes[i].sleeping = false;
00572 
00573                 debugMsgStr("\r\nRe-adding child ");
00574                 debugMsgHex(shortAddr);
00575                 return;
00576             }
00577 
00578         debugMsgStr("Adding child node ");
00579         debugMsgHex(shortAddr);
00580 
00581         // Add the node to the first open spot
00582         for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00583             if (!childNodes[i].childAddr)
00584             {
00585                 // Found an empty spot, store the address and leave
00586                 childNodes[i].childAddr = shortAddr;
00587                 childNodes[i].wakeup = false;
00588                 childNodes[i].sleeping = false;
00589 
00590                 // Notify the application
00591                 appChildAssociated(i);
00592 
00593                 return;
00594             }
00595     }
00596 }
00597 
00605 void macRemoveChild(u16 shortAddr)
00606 {
00607     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00608     {
00609         // remove from coord table, clear data
00610         if (shortAddr >= MAXNODES)
00611             return;
00612         nodes[shortAddr].nodeType = 0;
00613         nodes[shortAddr].parentShortAddress = 0;
00614         nodes[shortAddr].lastRoutedAddress =0;
00615     }
00616     if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00617     {
00618         u8 i;
00619 
00620         debugMsgStr("\r\nRemoving child node ");
00621         debugMsgHex(shortAddr);
00622 
00623         // find the node and clear it
00624         for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00625             if (childNodes[i].childAddr == shortAddr)
00626             {
00627                 childNodes[i].childAddr = 0;
00628                 break;
00629             }
00630     }
00631 }
00632 
00640 u16 macGetParent(u16 shortAddr)
00641 {
00642     // Coord only, return short address of the node's parent
00643     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00644     {
00645         if (shortAddr >= MAXNODES)
00646             return 0;
00647         return nodes[shortAddr].parentShortAddress;
00648     }
00649     return 0;
00650 }
00651 
00661 u16 macGetTopParent(u16 addr)
00662 {
00663     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00664     {
00665         if (addr >= MAXNODES)
00666             return 0;
00667         for(;;)
00668         {
00669             if (!nodes[addr].nodeType)
00670                 // This is a bad node, get out
00671                 return 0;
00672             if (macIsChild(addr))
00673                 return addr;
00674             // jump up the chain one step.
00675             addr = nodes[addr].parentShortAddress;
00676         }
00677     }
00678     return 0;
00679 }
00680 
00692 u16 findFirstChild(u16 addr)
00693 {
00694     // Return first child of node addr, or 0x0 if none found
00695 
00696     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00697     {
00698         u16 i;
00699         for (i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00700         {
00701             if (nodes[i].nodeType &&
00702                 nodes[i].parentShortAddress == addr)
00703             {
00704                 // found the first child in the list
00705                 return i;
00706             }
00707         }
00708         // none found, return zero
00709     }
00710     return 0;
00711 }
00712 
00713 
00725 u16 findNextSibling(u16 addr)
00726 {
00727     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00728     {
00729         if (addr >= MAXNODES)
00730             return 0;
00731 
00732         // find the next sibling of node addr
00733         u16 parent = nodes[addr].parentShortAddress;
00734         u16 i;
00735 
00736         for (i=addr+1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00737         {
00738             if (nodes[i].nodeType &&
00739                 nodes[i].parentShortAddress == parent)
00740                 // Found the next sibling
00741                 return i;
00742         }
00743     }
00744     // none found, return zero
00745     return 0;
00746 }
00747 
00748 #if __AVR__
00749 
00754 void macPrintTree(void)
00755 {
00756     if (DEBUG)
00757     {
00758         if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00759         {
00760             // debug stuff, print tree of all nodes
00761             char str[50];
00762             u16 ndx=0;
00763             u16 newNdx;
00764             //            u16 *p;
00765             u8 level=0;
00766             u8 i;
00767             associatedNodes_t *node;
00768             char nodeTypeStr[4] = "CCRE"; // Coord, Router, End
00769 
00770 
00771             debugMsgStr("\r\nTable Data:\r\n");
00772             for(i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00773             {
00774                 node = &nodes[i];
00775                 // see if this node is used
00776                 if (!node->nodeType)
00777                     continue;
00778 
00779                 // Print addresses
00780                 u32 low = node->nodeLongAddress & 0xffffffff;
00781                 u32 high = node->nodeLongAddress >> 32;
00782                 sprintf(str,"%c%02X %c%02X %02X 0x%08lX%08lX\r\n",
00783                         nodeTypeStr[node->nodeType],
00784                         i,
00785                         nodeTypeStr[nodes[node->parentShortAddress].nodeType],
00786                         nodes[i].parentShortAddress,
00787                         nodes[i].lastRoutedAddress,
00788                         high,
00789                         low);
00790                 debugMsgStr(str);
00791             }
00792 
00793 
00794             debugMsgStr("\r\nNetwork Tree\r\n");
00795 
00796             for(;;)
00797             {
00798                 // method:
00799                 // 1. Print current node number and some spaces
00800                 // 2. Find first child, if yes, goto step one
00801                 // 3. If no, find next sibling of node.
00802                 // 4. If no, print CRLF, bunch of spaces, and goto step 1
00803                 // 5. If yes (sibling), go back to parent
00804                 // 6. If parent == coord, quit
00805                 // 7. Goto step 3
00806                 node = &nodes[ndx];
00807 
00808                 sprintf(str,"%c%02X ",nodeTypeStr[node->nodeType], ndx);
00809                 debugMsgStr(str);
00810 
00811                 if ((newNdx = findFirstChild(ndx)))
00812                 {
00813                     // Child found, just go again
00814                     ndx = newNdx;
00815                     level++;
00816                     continue;
00817                 }
00818                 else
00819                 {
00820                 fns:
00821                     // No child found, look for a sibling
00822                     if ((newNdx = findNextSibling(ndx)))
00823                     {
00824                         // Found a sibling, print CRLF and some spaces
00825                         ndx = newNdx;
00826                         debugMsgStr("\r\n");
00827                         for (i=0;i<level;i++)
00828                             debugMsgStr("    ");
00829                         continue;
00830                     }
00831                     else
00832                     {
00833                         // No sibling found, go back to parent and look for more.
00834                         ndx = nodes[ndx].parentShortAddress;
00835                         if (!ndx)
00836                             // parent is coord, we are done
00837                             break;
00838                         // Go up one level
00839                         level--;
00840                         // and goto the find next sibling part
00841                         goto fns;
00842                     }
00843                 }
00844             }
00845 
00846         }
00847         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00848         {
00849             // Print child table
00850             char str[50];
00851             u16 i;
00852 
00853             debugMsgStr("Child Table for node ");
00854             sprintf(str,"%04X\r\n",macConfig.shortAddress);
00855             debugMsgStr(str);
00856 
00857             for(i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00858                 if (childNodes[i].childAddr)
00859                 {
00860                     sprintf(str,"%04X\r\n",childNodes[i].childAddr);
00861                     debugMsgStr(str);
00862                 }
00863             debugMsgStr("\r\n");
00864         }
00865     }
00866 }
00867 
00868 #else // __arm__
00869 
00875 void arm_macPrintTree(void)
00876 {
00877     if (DEBUG)
00878     {
00879         if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00880         {
00881             // debug stuff, print tree of all nodes
00882             //char str[50];
00883             u16 ndx=0;
00884             u16 newNdx;
00885             //            u16 *p;
00886             u8 level=0;
00887             u8 i;
00888             volatile associatedNodes_t *node;
00889 //            char nodeTypeStr[4] = "xCRE"; // Coord, Router, End
00890 
00891             debugMsgStr("\r\nTable Data:\r\n");
00892             debugMsgStr("Node   Parent   Last route   MAC addr\r\n");
00893             for(i=1;i<MAXNODES;i++)
00894             {
00895                 node = &nodes[i];
00896                 // see if this node is used
00897                 if (!node->nodeType)
00898                     continue;
00899 
00900                 // Print addresses
00901                 u32 low = node->nodeLongAddress & 0xffffffff;
00902                 u32 high = node->nodeLongAddress >> 32;
00903                 if(node->nodeType == 1)
00904                     fnDebugMsg("C");
00905                 else if(node->nodeType == 2)
00906                     fnDebugMsg("R");
00907                 else if(node->nodeType == 3)
00908                     fnDebugMsg("E");
00909                 fnDebugDec(i, 0, 0);
00910                 fnDebugMsg("    ");
00911                 if(nodes[node->parentShortAddress].nodeType == 1)
00912                     fnDebugMsg(" C");
00913                 else if(nodes[node->parentShortAddress].nodeType == 2)
00914                     fnDebugMsg(" R");
00915                 else if(nodes[node->parentShortAddress].nodeType == 3)
00916                     fnDebugMsg(" E");
00917                 fnDebugDec(nodes[i].parentShortAddress, 0, 0);
00918                 fnDebugMsg("       ");
00919                 fnDebugDec(nodes[i].lastRoutedAddress, 0, 0);
00920                 fnDebugMsg("           ");
00921                 fnDebugHex(high, (WITH_SPACE | WITH_LEADIN | CODE_CAPITALS | 4));
00922                 fnDebugHex(low, (CODE_CAPITALS | 4));
00923                 fnDebugMsg("\r\n");
00924             }
00925 
00926             debugMsgStr("\r\nNetwork Tree\r\n");
00927 
00928             for(;;)
00929             {
00930                 // method:
00931                 // 1. Print current node number and some spaces
00932                 // 2. Find first child, if yes, goto step one
00933                 // 3. If no, find next sibling of node.
00934                 // 4. If no, print CRLF, bunch of spaces, and goto step 1
00935                 // 5. If yes (sibling), go back to parent
00936                 // 6. If parent == coord, quit
00937                 // 7. Goto step 3
00938                 node = &nodes[ndx];
00939                 if(node->nodeType == 1)
00940                     fnDebugMsg("C");
00941                 else if(node->nodeType == 2)
00942                     fnDebugMsg("R");
00943                 else if(node->nodeType == 3)
00944                     fnDebugMsg("E");
00945                 //fnDebugHex(ndx, (WITH_SPACE | WITH_LEADIN | CODE_CAPITALS | 2));
00946                 fnDebugDec(ndx, 0, 0);
00947                 fnDebugMsg(" ");
00948 
00949 
00950                 if ((newNdx = findFirstChild(ndx)))
00951                 {
00952                     // Child found, just go again
00953                     ndx = newNdx;
00954                     level++;
00955                     continue;
00956                 }
00957                 else
00958                 {
00959                 fns:
00960                     // No child found, look for a sibling
00961                     if ((newNdx = findNextSibling(ndx)))
00962                     {
00963                         // Found a sibling, print CRLF and some spaces
00964                         ndx = newNdx;
00965                         fnDebugMsg("\r\n");
00966                         for (i=0;i<level;i++)
00967                             fnDebugMsg("   ");
00968                         continue;
00969                     }
00970                     else
00971                     {
00972                         // No sibling found, go back to parent and look for more.
00973                         ndx = nodes[ndx].parentShortAddress;
00974                         if (!ndx)
00975                             // parent is coord, we are done
00976                             break;
00977                         // Go up one level
00978                         level--;
00979                         // and goto the find next sibling part
00980                         goto fns;
00981                     }
00982                 }
00983             }
00984 
00985         }
00986         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00987         {
00988             // Print child table
00989             //char str[50];
00990             u16 i;
00991 
00992             fnDebugHex(macConfig.shortAddress, (WITH_LEADIN | CODE_CAPITALS | 2));
00993             fnDebugMsg("\r\n");
00994             for(i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
00995                 if (childNodes[i].childAddr)
00996                 {
00997                     fnDebugHex(macConfig.shortAddress, (WITH_LEADIN | CODE_CAPITALS | 2));
00998                 }
00999             fnDebugMsg("\r\n");
01000         }
01001     }
01002 }
01003 #endif // __AVR__
01004 
01005 // These two functions are targets to the timer function, called after a time
01006 // to send a Drop Notification packet and a routing packet to a router.
01007 static void mnd1(void)
01008 {
01009     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01010     {
01011         // Finally, send the packet
01012         ftDropChild frame;
01013 
01014         debugMsgStr("\r\nDropping child ");
01015         debugMsgHex(dropChild);
01016         debugMsgStr(" from parent ");
01017         debugMsgHex(dropParent);
01018 
01019         frame.fcf =  FCF_DATA;
01020         frame.seq =           macConfig.dsn++;
01021         frame.panid =         macConfig.panId;
01022         frame.destAddr =      macGetTopParent(dropParent);
01023         frame.srcAddr =       DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR;
01024         frame.finalDestAddr = dropParent;
01025         frame.originAddr =    DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR;
01026         frame.type =          DROP_CHILD_FRAME;
01027         // pass child address to drop
01028         frame.childAddr =     dropChild;
01029 
01030         // Send frame over the radio
01031         if (frame.destAddr != DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
01032             // don't send a message to ourself
01033             radioSendData(sizeof(ftDropChild) ,(u8*)&frame);
01034     }
01035 }
01036 void mnd2(void)
01037 {
01038     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01039     {
01040         // Send a routing packet and then the drop packet
01041         u8 rpSent;  // Routing packet sent?
01042 
01043         rpSent = macSendRoutingPacket(dropParent);
01044         macSetAlarm(rpSent ? MAC_RP_DELAY : 0, mnd1);
01045     }
01046 }
01047 
01059 void macNotifyDrop(u16 parent, u16 child)
01060 {
01061     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01062     {
01063         // wait a while, then send the routing packet and drop packet.
01064 
01065         // Save params for final drop packet.
01066         dropParent = parent;
01067         dropChild = child;
01068         macSetAlarm(MAC_NOTIFY_DELAY, mnd2);
01069         macConfig.busy = true;
01070     }
01071 
01072 }
01073 
01083 u16 macGetLastRoute(u16 parent)
01084 {
01085     if (NODETYPE == COORD && parent < MAXNODES)
01086         return nodes[parent].lastRoutedAddress;
01087     return 0;
01088 }

01098 void macSetLastRoute(u16 parent, u16 addr)
01099 {
01100     if (NODETYPE == COORD && parent < MAXNODES)
01101         nodes[parent].lastRoutedAddress = addr;
01102 }

01113 associatedNodes_t *macGetNode(u16 index)
01114 {
01115     // return pointer to node data.
01116     if (NODETYPE == COORD && index < MAXNODES)
01117         return &nodes[index];
01118     return NULL;
01119 }

01127 void macInitNodes(void)
01128 {
01129     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01130     {
01131         // Init nodes array - wipe out all of the table
01132         memset(&nodes, 0, sizeof(nodes));
01133     }
01134 }
01135 
01151 void macWakeChildNode(u16 addr)
01152 {
01153     if (RUMSLEEP)
01154     {
01155         if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01156         {
01157             // Find parent of the node
01158             u16 parent = macGetParent(addr);
01159             if (parent == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
01160             {
01161                 // this node is parent, set to wake up.
01162                 if (addr < MAXNODES)
01163                     nodes[addr].wakeup = true;
01164             }
01165             else
01166             {
01167                 // Send a packet to the node's parent router
01168                 macWakeRequest(parent, addr);
01169             }
01170         }
01171         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
01172         {
01173             // Search childnodes for child
01174             u8 i;
01175             for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
01176             {
01177                 if (childNodes[i].childAddr == addr)
01178                 {
01179                     // Set this node to wake up
01180                     childNodes[i].wakeup = true;
01181                     return;
01182                 }
01183             }
01184             // Not found, too bad.
01185         }
01186     }
01187 }
01188 
01196 void macClearChildWakeFlag(u16 addr)
01197 {
01198     if (RUMSLEEP)
01199     {
01200         // Is the address my child?
01201         if (!macIsChild(addr))
01202             return;
01203 
01204         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
01205         {
01206             u8 i;
01207 
01208             for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
01209             {
01210                 if (childNodes[i].childAddr == addr)
01211                 {
01212                     // Clear the wakeup flag
01213                     childNodes[i].wakeup = 0;
01214                     break;
01215                 }
01216             }
01217         }
01218         if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01219         {
01220             if (addr >= MAXNODES)
01221                 return;
01222             nodes[addr].wakeup = 0;
01223         }
01224     }
01225 }
01226 
01227 
01237 void macChildIsAwake(ftData *frame)
01238 {
01239     if (RUMSLEEP && NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE)
01240     {
01241         u16 addr = frame->originAddr;
01242 
01243         // Is the packet from my child?
01244         if (!macIsChild(addr))
01245             return;
01246 
01247         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
01248         {
01249             u8 i;
01250 
01251             for (i=0;i<MAXCHILDREN;i++)
01252             {
01253                 if (childNodes[i].childAddr == addr)
01254                 {
01255                     // Set sleeping flag based on whether high bit is set
01256                     childNodes[i].sleeping = (frame->type & 0x80 ? 1 : 0);
01257 
01258                     // Wakeup a child if necessary
01259                     if (childNodes[i].wakeup)
01260                     {
01261                         /* Wakeup the node, unless this is a wake packet,
01262                            in which case the node is already awake and
01263                            simply acknowledging that fact. */
01264                         if (frame->type == WAKE_NODE)
01265                             // Clear the wakeup flag, child is awake now
01266                             childNodes[i].wakeup = 0;
01267                         else
01268                             // Child has sent us something, and he must be woken up.
01269                             // Send a wakeup packet immediately.
01270                             macWakeRequest(addr, 0);
01271                         break;
01272                     }
01273 
01274                     // Send a stored frame if there is one.
01275                     if (RUMSLEEP)
01276                         macSendStoredFrame(addr);
01277                 }
01278             }
01279         }
01280         if (NODETYPE == COORD)
01281         {
01282             if (addr >= MAXNODES)
01283                 return;
01284 
01285             // Set sleeping flag based on whether high bit is set
01286             nodes[addr].sleeping = (frame->type & 0x80 ? 1 : 0);
01287 
01288             if (nodes[addr].wakeup)
01289             {
01290                 // Send the end node a wakeup frame
01291                 macWakeRequest(addr, 0);
01292                 // Clear the wakeup flag
01293                 nodes[addr].wakeup = 0;
01294             }
01295             // Send a stored frame if there is one.
01296             if (RUMSLEEP)
01297                 macSendStoredFrame(addr);
01298         }
01299     }
01300     // Reset the sleeping bit in the frame.
01301     frame->type &= ~0x80;
01302 }
01303 
01308 u16 macFirstChild(void)
01309 {
01310     if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
01311     {
01312         for (childNodeNdx=0;childNodeNdx<MAXCHILDREN;childNodeNdx++)
01313             if (childNodes[childNodeNdx].childAddr)
01314                 return childNodeNdx;
01315     }
01316 
01317     return 0;
01318 }
01319 
01325 u16 macNextChild(void)
01326 {
01327     if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
01328     {
01329         for (;childNodeNdx<MAXCHILDREN;childNodeNdx++)
01330             if (childNodes[childNodeNdx].childAddr)
01331                 return childNodeNdx;
01332     }
01333 
01334     return 0;
01335 }
01336 
01342 u8 macGetHopCount(u16 node_short)
01343 {
01344     u8 hops = 1;
01345 
01346     for(;;)
01347     {
01348         if (!nodes[node_short].nodeType)
01349             // bad short address, quit
01350             return 0;
01351 
01352         // see if we're just one hop away
01353         if (nodes[node_short].parentShortAddress == DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
01354         {
01355             return hops;
01356         }
01357 
01358         // find node's parent, the new node for next cycle
01359         node_short = nodes[node_short].parentShortAddress;
01360 
01361         // Go for another hop
01362         hops++;
01363     }
01364 }
